lines.text: If it was that early in the morning... everyone would've been asleep, right?
Maybe... they wanted to set off the fire alarm, and get the attention of someone who could come help?
Like, get the landlord to show up, or someone in the building.
You think a couple wizards would want that kind of attention?
That kind of attention, yeah- not police attention. Someone who could intervene before the cops showed up.
Unless they already had <c=#FF00FF>an escape plan,</c> I don't think they'd've gone for that.
